prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://howtocancelmytimeshare.com/cancel-your-villa-group-timeshare/ that feel at home on gardencenterguide.com.

Reference SERP keyword: travel
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): cancel Villa group timeshare

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:
- Portable Summer Gear for Outdoor Fun & Travel
- Fair View Nursery
- Garden center Russell's Garden Center in Wayland opening ...
- Garden center Cedar Falls Nursery in Hoquiam opening ...
- Dan West Garden Center
- Stein's Garden & Home Oshkosh
- Under The Sun Garden Center Stillwater
- Stein's Garden & Home Racine
- Harmony Nursery & Garden Center

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of gardencenterguide.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to gardencenterguide.com while naturally justifying a link to https://howtocancelmytimeshare.com/cancel-your-villa-group-timeshare/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude cancel Villa group timeshare and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
